      • calcProjectedEuclideanDistance

        public static double calcProjectedEuclideanDistance(Coord coord,
                                                    Coord other)
        Method to deal with distance calculation when only the x and y-components of the coordinates are used. The elevation (z component) is ignored, whether it is available or not. (xy-plane)
        Parameters:
        coord -
        other -
        Returns:

      • distancePointLinesegment

        public static double distancePointLinesegment(Coord lineFrom,
                                              Coord lineTo,
                                              Coord point)
        Calculates the shortest distance of a point to a line segment. The line segment is given by two points, lineFrom and lineTo. Note that the line segment has finite length, and thus the shortest distance cannot always be the distance on the tangent to the line through point.

        The 3D version was adapted from the C++ implementation of Dan Sunday.
        Parameters:
        lineFrom - The start point of the line segment
        lineTo - The end point of the line segment
        point - The point whose distance to the line segment should be calculated
        Returns:
        the distance of point to the line segment given by the two end points of the line segment, lineFrom and lineTo

      • orthogonalProjectionOnLineSegment

        public static Coord orthogonalProjectionOnLineSegment(Coord lineFrom,
                                                      Coord lineTo,
                                                      Coord point)
        Calculates the coordinate of the intersection point of the orthogonal projection of a given point on a line segment with that line segment. The line segment is given by two points, lineFrom and lineTo. If the projection point does not lie *on* the line segment (but only somewhere on the extension of the line segment, i.e. the infinite line), the end point of the line segment which is closest to the given point is returned.

        The 3D version was adapted from the documentation of David Eberly/a>.
        Parameters:
        lineFrom - The start point of the line segment
        lineTo - The end point of the line segment
        point - The point whose distance to the line segment should be calculated
        Returns:
        the coordinate of the intersection point of the orthogonal projection of a given point on a line segment with that line segment
